segue_the_chain: Since Lloyd was admirably, though unhelpfully, laconic we’re left to guess that the link is one of the following, if not both:

segue_dave.line: Daft Punk had a recording contract with Virgin and UB40 's "Dance With The Devil" was released by the same record label...
segue_dave.explanation: Daft Punk had a recording contract with the record label Virgin, and Daft Punk had a recording contract with the record label Virgin.
